content.prompt: A hypothesis test was conducted to investigate whether the population proportion of students at a certain college who went to the movie theater last weekend is greater than 0.2. A random sample of 100 students at this college resulted in a test statistic of 2.25. Assuming all conditions for inference were met, which of the following is closest to the p-value of the test?

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
